          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fi">Reunan leikkaaminen 2</string>
            <string language="en">Cutting the edge 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schnitt des Randes 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Coupure du bord 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cortando a borda 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Taglio del bordo 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοπή της άκρης 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cortar el borde 2</string>
          </title>
          <language>fi</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fi">Piirroksessa näytetään, miten yksiosaisella valumuotilla tehdyn savityön reuna leikataan.</string>
            <string language="en">The drawing shows how the edge of a ceramic work made with a one-piece mould is cut.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mould</string>
            <string language="en">edge</string>
            <string language="en">cutting</string>
            <string language="en">ceramic</string>
            <string language="fi">muottitekniikka,</string>
            <string language="fi">savi</string>
            <string language="fi">yksiosaiset</string>
            <string language="fi">käsityö</string>
            <string language="fi">valumuotit</string>
            <string language="fi">käsityökasvatus</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Zeichnung zeigt, wie der Rand einer 
keramischen Arbeit, die mit einer einteiligen Form gebildet wird, 
geschnitten wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le schéma montre comment le bord d'un travail en
céramique fait avec un moule d'une seule pièce est coupé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O desenho mostra como a borda de um trabalho 
cerâmico feito com um molde de uma peça só é cortada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'illustrazione mostra come il bordo di un lavoro
di ceramica fatto con una muffa di un pezzo è tagliato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σχέδιο επιδεικνύει πώς η άκρη μιας κεραμικής 
εργασίας που γίνεται με μια one-piece φόρμα κόβεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El gráfico muestra cómo el borde de un trabajo 
de cerámica hecho con un molde de una sola pieza se corta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Form</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
